sentences.english: A squadron of F-15 fighters is on its way home.
sentences.chinese: 一个F-15战斗机中队正在返程途中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空军中队；一群；骑兵中队；分遣队；小舰队
detailed_translations.english: a military force consisting of a group of aircraft or ships

name: trench
trans: n. 沟，沟渠；战壕；堑壕 vt. 掘沟 vi. 挖战壕；侵害 n. (Trench)人名；(英、西)特伦奇

sentences.english: Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.
sentences.chinese: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。

sentences.english: From nine to eleven he planned to dig a hole, or trench, and possibly find something good to eat buried in the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 九点到十一点，他打算挖一个洞，或者一条小沟也行，没准儿还能从脏土里翻出什么好吃的呢。

sentences.english: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground

name: triplane
trans: n. 三翼飞机

name: curvature
trans: n. 弯曲，[数] 曲率

sentences.english: Matter, energy and dark energy all produce curvature in space-time, however.
sentences.chinese: 而事实上，物质、能量和暗能量在时空中都会产生弯曲。

sentences.english: The hyperbolic surface, which has so-called negative curvature because its surface curves up and down at the same time, like a saddle, just might represent the shape of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 双曲表面，即通常所称的负曲率，因为它的表面曲线同时有的向上和有的向下，像一个马鞍，也许这样就可以代表宇宙的形状。

sentences.english: Then, with a few assumptions about the curvature and contents of the universe, they can reconstruct the positions of those objects from redshifts.
sentences.chinese: 然后，通过一些关于宇宙曲率和内容的假设，科学家们能够重建这些物体的位置。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being curved, or the degree to which something is curved

name: deduce
trans: vt. 推论，推断；演绎出

sentences.english: Alison cleverly deduced that I was the author of the letter.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉森聪明地推断出我是这封信的作者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推论， 推断， 演绎
detailed_translations.english: to use the knowledge and information you have in order to understand something or form an opinion about it

name: geometry
trans: n. 几何学 几何结构

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

name: logical
trans: adj. 合逻辑的，合理的；逻辑学的

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.english: a logical conclusion
sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

name: spherical
trans: adj. 球形的，球面的；天体的

sentences.english: ...purple and gold spherical earrings.
sentences.chinese: ...紫色和金色的球形耳环。

detailed_translations.english: having the shape of a sphere

name: bus
trans: n. 公共汽车 乘公共汽车

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

name: GPS
trans: abbr. 全球定位系统（Global Position System）；通用雷达（General Purpose Radar）；炮长主瞄准镜（Gunner's Primary Sight）

sentences.english: With GPS, they also now know where you are whenever you have your phone.
sentences.chinese: 利用全球定位系统，只要你带着电话，他们就知道你在哪里。

sentences.english: Used in combination with GPS, an accelerometer, a compass and the gyroscope can be used for in indoor navigation with floor accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 与全球定位系统、加速度计、陀螺仪和指南针结合使用，可用于具有地面精度的室内导航。

sentences.english: There are already USB GPS devices for tracking where you’ve been but here’s another device that will instead keep track of what the temperature was, if for some reason you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 已经有USB全球定位系统设备以追踪你的位置所在。 但是，如果你因某个原因需要知道温度的话,还有一个设备可以代替来追踪记录温度。

detailed_translations.english: a system that uses radio signals from  satellites  to show your exact position on the Earth on a special piece of equipment

name: gravity
trans: n. 重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

name: payload
trans: n. （导弹、火箭等的）有效载荷，有效负荷；收费载重，酬载；（工厂、企业等）工资负担

name: desolate
trans: adj. 荒凉的；无人烟的 vt. 使荒凉；使孤寂

sentences.english: a desolate landscape
sentences.chinese: 荒凉的景色

detailed_translations.english: a place that is desolate is empty and looks sad because there are no people there
a place that is desolate is empty and looks sad because there are no people there
someone who is desolate feels very sad and lonely

name: fortify
trans: vt. 加强；增强；（酒）的酒精含量；设防于 vi. 筑防御工事

sentences.english: Her position was fortified by election successes and economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 她的地位因为选举获胜及经济复苏而得到巩固。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage an attitude or feeling and make it stronger
to build towers, walls etc around an area or city in order to defend it

name: provisions
trans: n. 规定（provision的复数）；食品；预备 v. 供应补给品；供应粮食（provision的三单形式）

name: realization
trans: n. 实现；领悟

sentences.english: the realization of his dreams
sentences.chinese: 他的梦想成真

detailed_translations.english: when you achieve something that you had planned or hoped for

name: resolve
trans: vt. 决定；溶解；使…分解；决心要做… vi. 解决；决心；分解 n. 坚决；决定要做的事

sentences.english: Barnet was desperate for money to resolve his financial problems.
sentences.chinese: 巴尼特急需钱来解决他的经济问题。

sentences.english: After the divorce she resolved never to marry again.
sentences.chinese: 离婚以后，她决心永不再嫁。

sentences.english: Recent events strengthened her resolve to find out the truth.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件坚定了她找出真相的决心。

detailed_translations.english: to find a satisfactory way of dealing with a problem or difficulty
strong determination to succeed in doing something

name: stranded
trans: adj. 搁浅的；陷于困境的；有…股的（常用来构成复合词） v. 搁浅（strand的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: Air travellers were left stranded because of icy conditions.
sentences.chinese: 飞机乘客因冰冻天气而滞留。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搁浅的， 处于困境的
detailed_translations.english: a person or vehicle that is stranded is unable to move from the place where they are

name: canine
trans: adj. 犬的；犬齿的；犬科的；似犬的 n. 犬；[解剖] 犬齿 n. (Canine)人名；(英)卡奈因

sentences.english: canine diseases
sentences.chinese: 犬类疾病

sentences.english: her loyal canine friend
sentences.chinese: 她那忠实的狗朋友

detailed_translations.chinese: 犬的；犬齿的；犬科的；似犬的
detailed_translations.english: relating to dogs
one of the four sharp pointed teeth in the front of your mouth

name: distinguish
trans: vt. 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出 vi. 区别，区分；辨别

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

name: mascot
trans: n. 吉祥物；福神（等于mascotte） n. (Mascot)人名；(法)马斯科

sentences.english: the official mascot of the 2002 World Cup
sentences.chinese: 2002年世界杯的官方吉祥物

sentences.english: Rocky the Raccoon, the team mascot
sentences.chinese: 浣熊罗基，该队的吉祥物

detailed_translations.english: an animal or toy, or a person dressed as an animal, that represents a team or organization, and is thought to bring them good luck

name: regiment
trans: n. （军事单位）团；大量的人；统治，管辖 v. 对……严格管制；把（部队）编成团

sentences.english: the regimented routine of boarding school
sentences.chinese: 寄宿学校严格的生活规律

detailed_translations.english: to organize and control people firmly and usually too strictly
a large group of soldiers, usually consisting of several  battalion s

name: sergeant
trans: n. 军士；警察小队长；海军陆战队中士；高等律师 n. (Sergeant)人名；(英)萨金特；(法)塞尔让

sentences.english: Right, but how do you know there's a sergeant there?
sentences.chinese: 正确，可是你怎么知道那儿有一个中士？

detailed_translations.english: a low rank in the army, air force, police etc, or someone who has this rank

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: compatibility
trans: n. [计] 兼容性

name: feat
trans: n. 功绩，壮举；技艺表演 adj. 合适的；灵巧的

sentences.english: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.chinese: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

detailed_translations.english: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do

name: habitat
trans: n. [生态] 栖息地，产地 n. (Habitat)人名；(德)哈比塔特

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

detailed_translations.english: the natural home of a plant or animal

name: radiation
trans: n. 辐射；放射物

sentences.english: An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.
sentences.chinese: 发电站事故会造成大量核辐射泄漏。

sentences.english: a lethal dose of radiation
sentences.chinese: 致命剂量的辐射

sentences.english: Sun creams work by blocking harmful ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜可隔离有害的紫外线辐射。

detailed_translations.english: a form of energy that comes especially from nuclear reactions, which in large amounts is very harmful to living things

name: emigrate
trans: vi. 移居；移居外国 vt. 移民

sentences.english: He emigrated to Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 他移民去了比利时。

detailed_translations.english: to leave your own country in order to live in another country

name: ghetto
trans: n. 犹太人区；贫民区 vt. 使集中居住

sentences.english: unemployment in the ghetto
sentences.chinese: 贫民区里的失业问题

detailed_translations.english: a part of a city where people of a particular race or class, especially people who are poor, live separately from the rest of the people in the city. This word is sometimes considered offensive.

name: humanitarian
trans: adj. 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的 n. 人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者

sentences.english: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.english: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.english: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

name: legacy
trans: n. 遗赠，遗产

sentences.english: She received a small legacy from her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她从姨妈那里继承了一小笔遗产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产，遗赠；先人(或过去)留下的东西
detailed_translations.english: money or property that you receive from someone after they die

name: refuge
trans: n. 避难；避难所；庇护 vt. 给予…庇护；接纳…避难 vi. 避难；逃避

sentences.english: a wildlife refuge
sentences.chinese: 野生动物保护区

detailed_translations.english: shelter or protection from someone or something

name: interdependent
trans: adj. 相互依赖的；互助的

sentences.english: countries with interdependent economies
sentences.chinese: 经济上相互依赖的国家

detailed_translations.english: depending on or necessary to each other

name: parasite
trans: n. 寄生虫；食客

sentences.english: Kangaroos harbour a vast range of parasites.
sentences.chinese: 袋鼠身上有各种各样的寄生虫。

detailed_translations.english: a plant or animal that lives on or in another plant or animal and gets food from it

name: symbiotic
trans: adj. [生态] 共生的；共栖的

sentences.english: ...fungi that have a symbiotic relationship with the trees of these northwestern forests.
sentences.chinese: ...与这些位于西北部的森林里的树木存在共生关系的真菌。

detailed_translations.english: a symbiotic relationship is one in which the people, organizations, or living things involved depend on each other

name: amplifier
trans: n. [电子] 放大器，扩大器；扩音器

sentences.english: We can use them as an amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以将其当作放大器。

sentences.english: The audio interface must support your amplifier and speaker setup.
sentences.chinese: 音频接口必须支持您的扩音器和扬声器设置。

sentences.english: I was not just one college kid, I was an amplifier for him throughout the whole computer science department.
sentences.chinese: 我不仅是一个大学生，我同时也是那个可以帮他在整个计算机系中发声的扩音器。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes sound louder

name: concave
trans: adj. 凹的，凹面的 n. 凹面 v. 使变凹形

sentences.english: a concave lens
sentences.chinese: 凹透镜

detailed_translations.english: a concave surface is curved inwards in the middle

name: convex
trans: adj. 凸面的，凸出的；凸多边形的 n. 凸面，凸出部分

sentences.english: a convex lens
sentences.chinese: 凸透镜

sentences.english: a convex mirror
sentences.chinese: 凸镜

detailed_translations.english: curved outwards, like the surface of the eye

name: distorted
trans: adj. 歪曲的；受到曲解的 v. 扭曲（distort的过去式和过去分词）

name: emit
trans: vt. 发出，放射；发行；发表

sentences.english: The kettle emitted a shrill whistle.
sentences.chinese: 水壶发出了刺耳的鸣笛声。

detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc

name: observatory
trans: n. 天文台；气象台；瞭望台

sentences.english: An observatory on the back side of the Moon would be a giant leap for astronomy, but there is a for more important reason to return.
sentences.chinese: 即使仅仅在月球的背面设置一个天文台，也将为天文学带来革命性的突破，何况月球的价值远远不止这些。

sentences.english: With a full-power observatory in place, that explanation, as well as a better explanation of high-energy astrophysical phenomena throughout the universe, may be available in the years to come.
sentences.chinese: 一个满负荷运作的观测站的到位，对那些热点的解释，以及对遍及宇宙的高能天文学现象的更好的解释，将会在今年内成为可能。

name: argument
trans: n. 论证；论据；争吵；内容提要

sentences.english: She had a big argument with her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她和丈夫大吵了一架。

sentences.english: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.chinese: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people disagree, often angrily

name: commitment
trans: n. 承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

name: communication
trans: n. 通讯，[通信] 通信；交流；信函

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

name: principle
trans: n. 原理，原则；主义，道义；本质，本义；根源，源泉

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

name: volunteer
trans: n. 志愿者；志愿兵 adj. 志愿的 vi. 自愿 vt. 自愿

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do

name: bare
trans: adj. 空的；赤裸的，无遮蔽的 vt. 露出，使赤裸 n. (Bare)人名；(英)贝尔

sentences.english: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.chinese: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.english: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.english: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.chinese: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

detailed_translations.english: not covered by clothes

name: observant
trans: adj. 善于观察的；机警的；严格遵守的

sentences.english: a quiet and observant person
sentences.chinese: 一个寡言而机敏的人

sentences.english: Supervisors are trained to be observant.
sentences.chinese: 主管被训练得敏锐机警。

sentences.english: the writer’s observant eye for detail
sentences.chinese: 这位作家善于捕捉细节的敏锐目光

detailed_translations.chinese: 善于观察的；机警的；严格遵守的
detailed_translations.english: good or quick at noticing things

name: rapidity
trans: n. 迅速，急速；速度；险峻

sentences.english: And it is from this extended sense of connection that the magnitude of changes, the rapidity of changes, can truly begin to take place.
sentences.chinese: 并且在这扩展延伸的连接感觉当中强度会发生改变，而且是迅速的改变，这会真实的开始并且发生。

name: reassure
trans: vt. 使安心；使消除疑虑；安慰；重新保证，再次确保；（尤指保险）分保，给……再保险

sentences.english: Teachers reassured anxious parents.
sentences.chinese: 老师们安慰焦急的父母。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel calmer and less worried or frightened about a problem or situation

name: weakness
trans: n. 弱点；软弱；嗜好

sentences.english: The legislation has a fundamental weakness.
sentences.chinese: 这项立法有一个根本性缺陷。

sentences.english: The plan has strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划既有优点又有缺点。

sentences.english: muscular weakness
sentences.chinese: 肌无力

sentences.english: weakness in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济疲软

detailed_translations.english: a fault in someone’s character or in a system, organization, design etc

name: Yukon
trans: n. 育空（加拿大西北部地区）；（美洲）育空河

name: companion
trans: n. 同伴；朋友；指南；手册 vt. 陪伴 n. (Companion)人名；(英)康帕宁

sentences.english: For ten years he had been her constant companion .
sentences.chinese: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.english: His dog became his closest companion .
sentences.chinese: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.english: a travelling companion
sentences.chinese: 旅伴

detailed_translations.english: someone you spend a lot of time with, especially a friend

name: dignity
trans: n. 尊严；高贵

sentences.english: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.chinese: 我们这样做是因为我们相信每个人的尊严和价值。

sentences.english: They have to be treated well, with dignity.
sentences.chinese: 必须善待申请人，让人有尊严。

sentences.english: This award must be shared with everyone who strives for justice and dignity.
sentences.chinese: 我一定要与所有为正义和尊严奋斗的人分享此奖。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation

name: endure
trans: vt. 忍耐；容忍 vi. 忍耐；持续

sentences.english: It seemed impossible that anyone could endure such pain.
sentences.chinese: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining

name: grasp
trans: v. 抓牢，握紧；试图抓住；理解，领悟；毫不犹豫地抓住（机会） n. 抓，握；理解，领会；力所能及，把握；权力，控制

sentences.english: I grasped his arm firmly and led him away.
sentences.chinese: 我紧紧抓住他的胳膊把他带走。

sentences.english: Alan grasped the handle and pulled it.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦抓住手柄一拉。

sentences.english: A short opening paragraph enables the reader to quickly grasp what the article is about.
sentences.chinese: 开篇的小段落使读者很快就能掌握文章的大意。

sentences.english: Luke took her arm in a firm grasp and led her through the gate.
sentences.chinese: 卢克紧紧抓着她的胳膊，领她进了门。

detailed_translations.english: to take and hold something firmly
the way you hold something or your ability to hold it

name: federation
trans: n. 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府

sentences.english: the National Federation of Women’s Institutes
sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
detailed_translations.english: a group of organizations, clubs, or people that have joined together to form a single group

name: immigrant
trans: adj. 移民的；迁入的 n. 移民，侨民

sentences.english: an illegal immigrant
sentences.chinese: 非法移民

sentences.english: a new wave of immigrants from the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 来自中东的一股新兴的移民浪潮

detailed_translations.english: someone who enters another country to live there permanently

name: mosque
trans: n. 清真寺

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: reserve
trans: v. 预订（座位等）；储备；拥有（某种权利）；留出（一部分稍后使用）；用于（特定场合）；暂不作（判断或决定）；把……专门留给；弥撒后保留部分圣餐 n. 储备（量）；自然保护区；居住地；预备队；预备役部队；缄默；保留意见；储备金；（拍卖中的）底价；（印染中的）防染本色区 n. (Reserve) （挪、美、法、俄、墨）勒塞尔夫（人名）

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

name: rivalry
trans: n. 竞争；对抗；竞赛

sentences.english: The two players have developed a friendly rivalry .
sentences.chinese: 这两名选手之间已形成一种友好的竞争关系。

sentences.english: She had never overcome her feelings of sibling rivalry (= rivalry between brothers and sisters ) .
sentences.chinese: 她一直没有克服和兄弟姐妹较劲的那种心理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 竞争， 竞赛； 对抗
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people, teams, or companies are competing for something, especially over a long period of time, and the feeling of competition between them

name: truce
trans: n. 停战；休战；休战协定 vt. 以休战结束；停止争执 vi. 停战 n. (Truce)人名；(英)特鲁斯

sentences.english: They agreed to call a truce .
sentences.chinese: 他们同意宣布休战。

detailed_translations.english: an agreement between enemies to stop fighting or arguing for a short time, or the period for which this is arranged

name: berserker
trans: n. 暴汉；狂暴战士 adj. 狂暴的

name: brawl
trans: n. 喧闹，斗殴，闹事；布劳尔舞 v. 打斗，闹事，大声争吵；（诗、文）小溪哗哗地流

sentences.english: Fans brawled outside the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 球迷们在体育馆外面闹事。

detailed_translations.english: to quarrel or fight in a noisy way, especially in a public place

name: exiled
trans: adj. 被流放的，流亡的 v. 流放，放逐，使流亡（exile 的过去式和过去分词）

name: fearsome
trans: adj. 可怕的；害怕的；极大的

sentences.english: a fearsome weapon
sentences.chinese: 可怕的武器

detailed_translations.english: very frightening

name: shipwright
trans: n. 造船工人，造船木匠 n. (Shipwright)人名；(英)希普赖特

sentences.english: What is he that builds stronger than either the mason, the shipwright, or the carpenter?
sentences.chinese: 能比石匠、船匠和木匠建造出更坚固的建筑的人，他是谁？

sentences.english: But she knew that was only because, like Peter the Great in a shipwright's yard, he was studying what he wanted to know.
sentences.chinese: 但是苔丝知道，那只是因为他要学习他想学习的东西，就像彼得大帝到造船厂里去学习一样。

detailed_translations.english: someone who builds or repairs ships

name: dormant
trans: adj. 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的 n. (Dormant)人名；(法)多尔芒

sentences.english: a huge dormant volcano
sentences.chinese: 一座巨大的休眠火山

detailed_translations.chinese: 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的
detailed_translations.english: not active or not growing at the present time but able to be active later

name: geothermal
trans: adj. [地物] 地热的；[地物] 地温的

sentences.english: a geothermal energy plant
sentences.chinese: 地热能工厂

detailed_translations.english: relating to or coming from the heat inside the Earth

name: magma
trans: n. [地质] 岩浆；糊剂 n. (Magma)人名；(英)马格马

sentences.english: The volcano threw new showers of magma and ash into the air.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山向空气中喷发了新的岩浆和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot melted rock below the surface of the Earth

name: seismic
trans: adj. 地震的；因地震而引起的

sentences.english: increased seismic activity
sentences.chinese: 越来越频繁的地震活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 地震的；因地震而引起的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by  earthquakes

name: conserve
trans: vt. 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒 n. 果酱；蜜饯

sentences.english: We must conserve our woodlands for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须为子孙后代保护林地。

sentences.english: efforts to conserve fish stocks
sentences.chinese: 保护鱼类资源的努力

detailed_translations.english: to protect something and prevent it from changing or being damaged

name: pollution
trans: n. 污染 污染物

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

name: population
trans: n. 人口；[生物] 种群，[生物] 群体；全体居民；[统计学] 总体

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

name: sustainable
trans: adj. 可以忍受的；足可支撑的；养得起的；可持续的

sentences.english: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.english: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.chinese: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.english: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.english: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.chinese: 生态环境的可持续发展

detailed_translations.english: able to continue without causing damage to the environment

name: alliteration
trans: n. 头韵；同音韵错误症

name: antonym
trans: n. [语] 反义词

sentences.english: a dictionary of synonyms and antonyms
sentences.chinese: 同义词和反义词词典

detailed_translations.english: a word that means the opposite of another word

name: cadence
trans: n. 节奏；韵律；抑扬顿挫 n. (Cadence)人名；(法)卡当斯

sentences.english: the cadence of my mother’s voice
sentences.chinese: 我母亲语调的抑扬顿挫

detailed_translations.english: the way someone’s voice rises and falls, especially when reading out loud

name: linguistic
trans: adj. 语言的；语言学的

sentences.english: a child’s linguistic development
sentences.chinese: 儿童的语言发展

detailed_translations.english: related to language, words, or linguistics

name: simile
trans: n. 明喻；直喻

sentences.english: In Book One alone there are four primary instances of what we can think of as this primary simile dynamic.
sentences.chinese: 仅第一本里就有四个主要的例证,我们可以看作最初的明喻来源的动力。

sentences.english: Lister said people should follow the 1946 advice of writer George Orwell: "Never use a metaphor, simile, or other figure of speech which you are used to seeing in print.
sentences.chinese: 李斯特说人们最好遵循作家乔治·奥威尔1946年提出的建议：“不要使用那些在各种出版物上频繁出现的暗喻、明喻或其他修辞格。”

sentences.english: The simile is a common device and a useful one, but similes coming in rapid fire, one right on top of another, are more distracting than illuminating.
sentences.chinese: 明喻是常用的修辞术，也很好用，但是像连珠炮式的比喻与其说是富有启发性，不如说是在转移注意力。

detailed_translations.english: an expression that describes something by comparing it with something else, using the words ‘as’ or ‘like’, for example ‘as white as snow’

name: synonym
trans: n. 同义词；同义字

sentences.english: The term "industrial democracy" is often used as a synonym for worker participation.
sentences.chinese: “工业民主”这一词语常被用作“工人参与”的同义词。

detailed_translations.english: a word with the same meaning as another word in the same language

name: customize
trans: vt. 定做，按客户具体要求制造

sentences.english: a customized car
sentences.chinese: 按需要定制的汽车

detailed_translations.chinese: 定做，按客户具体要求制造
detailed_translations.english: to change something to make it more suitable for you, or to make it look special or different from things of a similar type

name: innovative
trans: adj. 革新的，创新的；新颖的；有创新精神的

sentences.english: an innovative approach to language teaching
sentences.chinese: 创新的语言教学法

sentences.english: innovative schemes for recycling waste materials
sentences.chinese: 废物回收利用的创新计划

detailed_translations.english: an innovative idea or way of doing something is new, different, and better than those that existed before

name: prototype
trans: n. 原型；标准，模范

sentences.english: How do you test the prototype of the vending machine?
sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

name: compound
trans: n. [化学] 化合物；混合物；复合词 adj. 复合的；混合的 v. 合成；混合；恶化，加重；和解，妥协

sentences.english: ...the big compound eyes of dragonflies.
sentences.chinese: …蜻蜓的大复眼。

detailed_translations.english: Compound is used to indicate that something consists of two or more parts or things
a substance containing atoms from two or more  elements

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恶化， 加重； 使化合， 使合成
detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult situation worse by adding more problems

name: extinct
trans: adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

name: humane
trans: adj. 仁慈的，人道的；高尚的

sentences.english: the campaign for the humane treatment of criminals
sentences.chinese: 提倡人道地对待罪犯的运动

sentences.english: a better, more humane world
sentences.chinese: 更美好、更人道的社会

detailed_translations.english: treating people or animals in a way that is not cruel and causes them as little suffering as possible

name: internship
trans: n. 实习生；（美）实习期；实习医师职位

sentences.english: ...an internship in surgery in New York.
sentences.chinese: …一个在纽约做外科实习的职位。

detailed_translations.english: a job that lasts for a short time, that someone, especially a student, does in order to gain experience

name: specimen
trans: n. 样品，样本；标本

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

name: captivity
trans: n. 囚禁；被关

sentences.english: The hostages were released from captivity.
sentences.chinese: 人质被释放了。

detailed_translations.english: when a person or animal is kept in a prison,  cage  etc and not allowed to go where they want

name: enrichment
trans: n. 丰富；改进；肥沃；发财致富

sentences.english: ...the enrichment of society.
sentences.chinese: …社会的富足。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发财致富, 丰富, 肥沃
detailed_translations.english: Enrichment is the act of enriching someone or something or the state of being enriched

name: intrusive
trans: adj. 侵入的；打扰的

sentences.english: They found the television cameras too intrusive.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为电视摄像机太烦人了。

detailed_translations.english: affecting someone’s private life or interrupting them in an unwanted and annoying way

name: perception
trans: n. 认识能力；知觉，感觉；洞察力；看法；获取

sentences.english: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

detailed_translations.english: Perception is the recognition of things using your senses, especially the sense of sight

name: respite
trans: n. 缓解；暂缓；暂时的休息；缓期执行 vt. 使缓解；使暂缓；使延期；缓期执行

sentences.english: There was no respite from the suffocating heat.
sentences.chinese: 闷热的天气根本没有缓解。

sentences.english: SHADE, from the upper cantilevering storey, brings respite and is welcoming in this tropical region.
sentences.chinese: 阴影来自于上层的悬挑部分，在热带地区为小屋带来暂时的休息和欢迎。

sentences.english: It was quite different from the verdant surroundings that we were used to in Slovenia, and respite only came from stopping at the small towns and villages that we came across along the Adriatic coast.
sentences.chinese: 这和我们走过的斯洛文尼亚郁郁葱葱的环境很不一样，只有在走过亚得里亚海长长的海岸线上那些小镇和村庄时，我们才能得到暂时的休息。

name: zoo
trans: n. 动物园 n. (Zoo)人名；(朝)朱；(阿拉伯)祖

sentences.english: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
